message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 10
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Grants
10
Convocatoria de ayudas PIF para realizar Estancias de 
Investigación Internacional igual o superior a 3 meses
(3-6 months stay for predoc researchers)
o For PhD students.
o Always between 3 and 6 months
o People with the predoc grant has priority (but never full).
o Travel grant (500 - 1000 €) + Stay ( max. 1200 € per month).
o Can be combined with a grant by the destiny institution.
o Deadline: March of the year of the stay (it can be retroactive).
o Stay during a natural year (from January to December).
Extra: if you have a FP., you have a dedicated grant!
speaker: SYSTEM
